translations: 引诱，诱导（lure 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: Of course it was to this that Peter had been luring them.
sentences.translation: 当然，这是彼得一直在引诱他们的目的。

sentences.sentence: Julie Parks of Grand Rapids Community points to another key to luring Millennials into manufacturing: a work/life balance.
sentences.translation: 大急流城社区大学的朱莉·帕克斯指出了另一个吸引千禧一代进入制造业的关键：工作和生活的平衡。

sentences.sentence: Julie Parks of Grand Rapids Community College points to another key to luring Millennials into manufacturing: a work/life balance.
sentences.translation: 大急流城社区大学的朱莉·帕克斯指出了吸引千禧一代进入制造业的另一个关键：工作与生活的平衡。
